task.en: Help me make the `jpg` folder a shared folder. If prompted, my user name is `ec2-user` and the password is `000000`.
task.zh: 帮我把这个`jpg`文件夹改成一个共享文件夹。如果要用到，我的用户名是`ec2-user`，密码是`000000`。
task.ar: ساعدني في جعل مجلد `jpg` مجلداً مشتركاً. إذا طلب، اسم المستخدم هو `ec2-user` وكلمة المرور هي `000000`.
task.ja: この`jpg`フォルダーを共有フォルダーにしてください。必要に応じて、ユーザー名は`ec2-user`、パスワードは`000000`です。
task.ru: Сделайте папку `jpg` общей. Если потребуется, мое имя пользователя — `ec2-user`, а пароль — `000000`.

pre_command: open /Users/ec2-user/Desktop; osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to close windows' && rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents && open /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Separated_images
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'jpg Info' && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q '“jpg”简介' && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep 'معلومات' | grep -q "jpg" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'jpgの情報' && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'jpg — свойства' && echo "True" || echo "False"
